
unzip apache-log4j-2.17.0-bin/log4j-core-2.17.0.jar META-INF/MANIFEST.MF

cat MANIFEST.MF | jc --metamf > MANIFEST.MF.json

#####

unzip -c apache-log4j-2.17.0-bin/log4j-core-2.17.0.jar META-INF/MANIFEST.MF > unzip_c_MANIFEST.MF.single_jar.out
unzip -c apache-log4j-2.17.0-bin/log4j-core-2.17.0.jar META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | jc --metamf > unzip_c_MANIFEST.MF.single_jar.json

#####

unzip -c 'apache-log4j-2.17.0-bin/*.jar' META-INF/MANIFEST.MF > unzip_c_MANIFEST.MF.multi_jar.out
unzip -c 'apache-log4j-2.17.0-bin/*.jar' META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | jc --metamf > unzip_c_MANIFEST.MF.multi_jar.json
